foreignData.flavorText: Ruhm und Einsamkeit treffen hier aufeinander.
foreignData.name: Ley-Linie der Einzigartigkeit
foreignData.text:
Falls die Ley-Linie der Einzigartigkeit auf deiner Anfangshand ist, kannst du sie vor Spielbeginn ins Spiel bringen.
Alle bleibenden Karten, die keine Länder sind, sind legendär.

foreignData.flavorText: Donde el renombre y la soledad convergen.
foreignData.name: Línea mística de la singularidad
foreignData.text:
Si la Línea mística de la singularidad está en tu mano inicial, puedes comenzar el juego con ella en juego.
Todos los permanentes que no sean tierra son legendarios.

foreignData.flavorText: Là où convergent renommée et solitude.
foreignData.name: Ligne ley de singularité
foreignData.text:
Si la Ligne ley de singularité est dans votre main de départ, vous pouvez l'avoir en jeu au début de la partie.
Tous les permanents non-terrain sont légendaires.

foreignData.flavorText: Il punto d'unione tra celebrità e solitudine.
foreignData.name: Leyline del Paradosso
foreignData.text:
Se la Leyline del Paradosso si trova nella tua mano iniziale, puoi cominciare la sfida con questa carta in gioco.
Tutti i permanenti non terra sono leggendari.

foreignData.flavorText: 名声と孤独の集まるところ。
foreignData.name: 不同の力線
foreignData.text:
不同の力線があなたのゲーム開始時の手札にある場合、あなたはそれが場に出ている状態でゲームを開始してもよい。
すべての土地でないパーマネントは伝説である。

foreignData.flavorText: Onde a reputação e a solidão se encontram.
foreignData.name: Linha de Força da Singularidade
foreignData.text:
Se Linha de Força da Singularidade estiver em sua mão de abertura, você poderá começar o jogo com ela em jogo.
Todas as permanentes que não sejam terrenos tornam-se lendárias.

foreignData.flavorText: Там, где сходятся известность и одиночество.
foreignData.name: Лучи своеобразия
foreignData.text:
Если Лучи своеобразия находятся в вашей стартовой руке, вы можете начать игру с Лучами своеобразия, введенными в игру.
Все перманенты, не являющиеся землями, становятся легендарными.

foreignData.name: 非凡地脉
foreignData.text:
若你起手的手牌包含了非凡地脉，你可以让它在场来开始游戏。
所有非地的永久物均是传奇。

name: Leyline of Singularity
originalText:
If Leyline of Singularity is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it in play.
All nonland permanents are legendary.

rulings.text: Adding a supertype doesn’t overwrite other supertypes. Each nonland permanent will be legendary in addition to its other supertypes.

The “legend rule” says that if a player controls two or more legendary permanents with the same name, that player chooses one of them and the rest are put into their owners’ graveyards. Notably, if you control Leyline of Singularity and two or more creature tokens with the same name, only one of the tokens will be allowed to remain on the battlefield.

If the game starts with more than one Leyline of Singularity under a single player’s control, all but one of them will be put into their owners’ graveyards right after the upkeep of the first turn starts. If the game started with multiple copies of any other Leylines under a single player’s control, that player will also put all but one of them into their graveyard at that time.

A player’s “opening hand” is the hand of cards the player has after all players have taken mulligans and “scryed” if applicable. If players have any cards in hand that allow actions to be taken with them from a player’s opening hand, the starting player takes all such actions first in any order, followed by each other player in turn order. Then the first turn begins.

text:
If Leyline of Singularity is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.
All nonland permanents are legendary.
